text: Luis Jiménez (born 4 June 1924) is a Mexican former sports shooter. He competed in the 25 metre pistol event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Mexican male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Mexico Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Mexico Category:Pan American Games medalists in shooting Category:Sportspeople from Guadalajara, Jalisco Category:Shooters at the 1955 Pan American Games
title: Luis Jiménez (sport shooter)
